email_text:
Subject: Save the Date: Company Wellness Day on October 15th

Dear Team,

I am excited to announce that our company will be hosting a Wellness Day on Friday, October 15th. This day is dedicated to promoting health and well-being among our employees, and will include various activities and resources to help you relax and rejuvenate.

Throughout the day, we will have wellness workshops, fitness classes, mindfulness sessions, and healthy snacks available for all employees to enjoy. This is a great opportunity for you to take a break from your daily routine and focus on your physical and mental well-being.

We encourage all employees to participate in the Wellness Day activities and make the most out of this opportunity to prioritize your health. Please mark your calendars and stay tuned for more details on the schedule and activities planned for the day.

If you have any questions or suggestions for the Wellness Day, please feel free to reach out to the HR team. We look forward to seeing you all there and hope that you will take advantage of this day to prioritize your health and well-being.

Best regards,

[Your Name]
HR Manager
